name: Cyber Swiper
description:
Now is the time to take a long journey into a far away galaxy, filled with rich planets and monumental alien structures! Explore unique worlds, avoid difficult obstacles and deadly traps, activate power ups, smash your way through huge glasses and accelerate yourself to outrun the impossible! Lots of tricky, randomized levels are waiting for your spaceship to dock in and get the ball rolling!

Be safe, Operative!

KEY FEATURES
* iPhone X support
* 120Hz ProMotion Display support
* Superb destruction physics
* Brilliant futuristic dimensions
* Loads of challenging levels
* Randomized level structures
* Smooth and addictive gameplay
* Simple and intuitive controls
* Full retina display support
* Leaderboards & achievements

CONTROLS
* Swipe LEFT and RIGHT to move the ball on the wall of the tunnel

TIPS
* Follow the score orbs, power ups and glasses as they set an optimal route
* Use the accelerator zones to speed up and get out of difficult situations
* Be careful not the hit the solid obstacles and the different laser traps
* Listen to warnings about approaching enemies and hidden turrets
* Smash through everything on the Triumph levels for maximum score

Please rate the game and submit your feedback for further improvements!
